metadata.title: Marine Research | Marine Survey Specialists
metadata.description: Specialists in offshore wind, geophysical surveys, and geotechnical investigations.

hero.title: Creating a Safe and Sustainable
hero.description: Marine Research discovers the possibilities of the sea with expertise in offshore wind, geophysical surveys, and geotechnical investigations.

services.title: Core Services
services.subtitle: Marine Research provides professional services across all areas of marine survey

offshoreWind.title: Offshore Wind
offshoreWind.description: Comprehensive marine survey services for offshore wind farm construction.

geophysical.title: Geophysical Survey
geophysical.description: Utilizing state-of-the-art multibeam echosounders, side-scan sonar, and sub-bottom profilers.

hydrographic.title: Hydrographic Survey
hydrographic.description: Integrated hydrographic survey services for precision bathymetry and chart production.

marinePhysics.title: Physical Oceanography
marinePhysics.description: Reducing project risks through physical oceanographic data analysis.

fishery.title: Fisheries Resources Survey
fishery.description: Providing sustainable management foundations through fisheries environment and resource assessment.

rnd.title: R&D
rnd.description: Research and development activities for marine survey technology innovation.

projects.title: Project Portfolio
projects.subtitle: Expertise and know-how accumulated from diverse marine projects

equipment.title: Scientific Equipment
equipment.subtitle: Survey & Observation Systems
equipment.note: Equipment configuration may vary by project.

about.title: Discovering the
about.description: Since its establishment in 2004, Marine Research has been leading Korea's marine survey industry.

greeting.title: CEO Message
greeting.description: Our commitment to the ocean, our vision, and the trust we build with our clients.

vision.title: Vision & Philosophy
vision.description: Core values and philosophy for sustainable marine surveys.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.subtitle: Practicing sustainable marine surveys based on environment, safety, and ethics

safety.title: Health & Safety
safety.description: Prioritizing on-site safety and health management.

environment.title: Environmental
environment.description: Eco-friendly operational principles for marine environment conservation.

social.title: Social
social.description: Practicing social responsibility based on respect and consideration.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Adhering to transparent management and fair ethical standards.
